resources.string: Select the word to update and enter the new word
Reorder these letter to form the correct word:\n
What will you do with the database?

The game is a Pac-Man-like. Your character move on his own, you just have to swipe to give it the direction it must follow. Your goal is to take all letters before finding the word. Be careful, some words are in two words. Avoid the ghost, you only have three lives. Good luck!
